title: Call to Obey and Remember
summary: Deuteronomy 4 urges Israel to obey Godâ€™s commands, avoid idolatry, and remember the covenant. Moses reminds them of the greatness of God and the uniqueness of their relationship with Him, warning of exile if they turn to idols.

faq.question: What does Moses urge the people to do?
faq.answer: To obey God's laws and remember His mighty acts.

faq.question: What warning does Moses give about idolatry?
faq.answer: That turning to idols would lead to exile, but God would still receive them if they returned with all their heart.
